author: jmclean
msg: Updated logo to correct Apacke Flex logo.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4413: Fix SolrCore#getIndexDir() to return the current index directory.
SOLR-4469: A new IndexWriter must be opened on SolrCore reload when the index directory has changed and the previous SolrCore's state should not be  propagated.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4413: Fix SolrCore#getIndexDir() to return the current index directory.
SOLR-4469: A new IndexWriter must be opened on SolrCore reload when the index directory has changed and the previous SolrCore's state should not be  propagated.
